subject: United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer collected his 12th Grand Slam singles title on Sunday, in only his 14th appearance in a major final, moving two behind Pete Sampras for the career lead.
snippet: Roger Federer collected his 12th Grand Slam singles title on Sunday, in only his 14th appearance in a major final, moving two behind Pete Sampras for the career lead.
